A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Yikes.  Did Rian Johnson ever see a Star Wars movie before piloting this steamy pile of crap?  No closure on the new characters from TFA\, totally underused them to give us Rose\, the most useless character since Jar Jar Binks.  I actually like Benecio del Toro\, but his part was very minor...maybe we'll see him in episode 9?

Comedy was forced and unfunny.  Dialogue was weak and what they did to Luke was a travesty.  He was going to kill his nephew in his sleep?  The same Luke who refused to kill Vader?  Ok.

I'll see episode 9 as long as Rian Johnson isn't at the helm and the annyoing Rose is not in it.  Otherwise\, thank you Star Wars for the decades of entertainment but I'm out.
